ygData.msgSnippet: I play on mithaniel marr,  also leader of the Black Moon guild. Its a quest for the blued hammer. stats are same as the ogre maul but is a mijik item and will
ygData.messageBody:
I play on mithaniel marr, also leader of the Black Moon guild.
Its a quest for the blued hammer. stats are same as the ogre maul but is a
mijik item and will do involk lightning

Danek
